com.esri.mo2.map.draw
Interface ColorScheme

All Known Implementing Classes:
RandomColorSchemes, SampleColorSchemes
public interface ColorScheme

A logical collection of colors that can be accessed randomly for the purpose of generating randomly colored Symbols within the draw package. ColorScheme is used by the following classes:

 
     - BaseWorkspaceLayerSource
     - WorkspaceLayerSource
     - BaseSimpleRenderer
     - SampleColorSchemes
     - ImagefileHandler
     - SDEHandler
     - ShapefileHandler
     - UniqueValuesRendererUI
     - ValueMapRenderer
     - CMap

Method Summary
 Color getNext()
          get the "next" color in the color scheme.
 

Method Detail

getNext

public Color getNext()
get the "next" color in the color scheme. This method returns a random color from within the scheme.
